name.en: Radiant Typhoon Varuroon, the Sea Spirit
name.ja: <ruby>絢<rt>けん</rt></ruby><ruby>嵐<rt>らん</rt></ruby>たる<ruby>海<rt>かい</rt></ruby><ruby>霊<rt>れい</rt></ruby>ヴァルルーン

text.en:
2 "Radiant Typhoon" monsters
If this card is Link Summoned: You can add 1 "Mystical Space Typhoon" from your Deck or GY to your hand. You can target 2 face-up monsters on the field, including a "Radiant Typhoon" monster you control; place them face-up in their owners' Spell & Trap Zones as Continuous Spells. If a Quick-Play Spell Card is activated (except during the Damage Step): You can place 1 "Radiant Typhoon" Continuous Trap from your Deck or GY face-up on your field. You can only use each effect of "Radiant Typhoon Varuroon, the Sea Spirit" once per turn.
